title: Drawing, "House with a Porch", ca. 1858–60
medium: Graphite, brush and blue, red, and brown wash on  brown paper
markings: Watermark: "Damask Linene" and hand holding a rose
creditline: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
description: Horizontal view of a house with a porch, yard and fence, and a tree behind.  Porch is filled with household paraphernalia and the gate has a broken hinge.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "House with a Porch", ca. 1858–60.
ca. 1858–60. Graphite, brush and blue, red, and brown wash on  brown paper. Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.. 1912-12-267.
